a:r.a:t: Provides a wide range of business services including temporary staffing, job advertisement and development related services
Also offers permanent placement employment services
Acquired the CSI Companies in 2010 and Advance Resourcing in 2010 for $410m
An acquisition would be an opportunity to expand its market share in the retained / executive search space, to increase penetration in the middle market and further develop its U.S. footprint
Advises clients on the recruitment of senior level executives
Offers executive search, CEO / board advisory, culture assessment, family business advisory solutions and more
Serves business services, consumer, education, energy, financial services, healthcare, industrial, nonprofit, private equity, and technology industries
Acquired executive search and board leadership recruitment provider Amrop AS in 2016
An acquisition would be an opportunity to expand its market share in the retained / executive search space and to increase penetration in the middle market
Provides executive search consultancy services that include senior-level executive and recruitment, board advisory, board assessments, board director recruitment and more
Primarily serves business and professional services, consumer, education, government, energy, financial services, industrial, life sciences, technology, media and telecommunications clients
Acquired provider of research products and analytics solutions Reya Group in 2014
An acquisition would strengthen Spencer Stuart’s market share
